Package com.ae2dms.Business

Class GameDocument

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.Business.GameDocument
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class GameDocument
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
the Model in MVC, only contains the data and underlying logic can be serialized to store every state
See Also:
Serialized Form

    always point to the current level

    The name of this game
    private int initialMapHashCode
    the hashcode of initial Map, initialized later by MapFileLoader, to authenticate the record file

    The arraylist of Levels to store all levels read from map file

    The static logger

    The customized mapsetName defined in map file

    the Moves Count of this map, will be bind by View after

    the Serializable move count, only used as cache of MovesCount before serializing this document
    private Player playerObject
    always point to the Player object in the current level
    static GameRecord records
    The static GameRecord to store all records, can restore all records from defined directory by calling restoreRecords()

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void changeToNextLevel()
    change to next level, and change the PlayerObject as well if is the last level, then the current level will be set to null

    Gets current level.

    Gets levels count.
    Level getNextLevel()
    get the next level from current level, if first called, will set to the first level if there is no more levels left, will return null

    Gets player.

    the init method to call when load a new GameDocument

    Is game complete boolean.

    check if the current level is complete

    load the Map from input given will change the levels, mapSetName and initialMapHashCode accordingly
    void reloadMapFromFile​(java.io.InputStream input)
    to reload a customized map from inputStream will flush all data and state stored before
    void reloadStateFromFile​(java.io.InputStream input)
    to reload a previously saved .skbsave from inputStream will flush all data and state stored before
    void restoreObject​(GameDocument object)
    restore some of the data field to this from the given another GameDocument Object
    void saveRecord​(int steps, java.lang.String name, int time)
    push this record to GmeRecord
    void serializeCurrentState()
    Push the current state of this document to GameStageSaver to realize the redo function, as GameStageSaver will store a Stack of serialized document
    private void serializeInitialState()
    Push the initial state of this document to GameStageSaver can be used when re-start the game from menu
    boolean undo()
    Undo to the last state

      Throws:
      MapFileLoader.ErrorMapFileLoadException

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()
      Gets player.
      Returns:
      return the Player object of this level, will be changed when level switched

      load the Map from input given will change the levels, mapSetName and initialMapHashCode accordingly

      input - input stream of raw map
      Throws:
      MapFileLoader.ErrorMapFileLoadException

      Is game complete boolean.
      Returns:
      the boolean

    • changeToNextLevel

      public void changeToNextLevel()
      change to next level, and change the PlayerObject as well if is the last level, then the current level will be set to null

    • getNextLevel

      public Level getNextLevel()
      get the next level from current level, if first called, will set to the first level if there is no more levels left, will return null
      Returns:
      the next level object or null if no more lefts

    • getCurrentLevel

      public Level getCurrentLevel()
      Gets current level.
      Returns:
      the current level

    • getLevelsCount

      public int getLevelsCount()
      Gets levels count.
      Returns:
      the total counts of all levels

    • reloadMapFromFile

      public void reloadMapFromFile​(java.io.InputStream input) throws MapFileLoader.ErrorMapFileLoadException
      to reload a customized map from inputStream will flush all data and state stored before
      Parameters:
      input - the InputStream of the map file
      Throws:
      MapFileLoader.ErrorMapFileLoadException - the error map file load exception

    • reloadStateFromFile

      public void reloadStateFromFile​(java.io.InputStream input) throws MapFileLoader.ErrorSaveFileLoadException
      to reload a previously saved .skbsave from inputStream will flush all data and state stored before
      Parameters:
      input - the InputStream of the save file
      Throws:
      MapFileLoader.ErrorSaveFileLoadException - the error save file load exception

    • serializeInitialState

      private void serializeInitialState()
      Push the initial state of this document to GameStageSaver can be used when re-start the game from menu
      See Also:
      GameStageSaver

    • serializeCurrentState

      public void serializeCurrentState()
      Push the current state of this document to GameStageSaver to realize the redo function, as GameStageSaver will store a Stack of serialized document
      See Also:
      GameStageSaver

    • restoreObject

      public void restoreObject​(GameDocument object)
      restore some of the data field to this from the given another GameDocument Object
      Parameters:
      object - another GameDocument with data to be stored to this document

    • saveRecord

      public void saveRecord​(int steps, java.lang.String name, int time)
      push this record to GmeRecord
      Parameters:
      steps - the steps of this turn
      name - the name inputted by user
      time - the seconds duration of this turn
      See Also:
      GameRecord

    • undo

      public boolean undo()
      Undo to the last state
      Returns:
      true if restored, false if no stage available
